Job Position: Human Resource Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

	Our client seeks an experienced HR professional to enhance its people strategy, boost team performance, and support ongoing growth.
	The ideal candidate will excel at fostering strong organisational cultures, managing talent, and supporting high-performing project teams.

	Lead recruitment, training, and employee engagement for an expanding workforce
	Drive HR initiatives that support productivity and organisational growth
	Manage onboarding, performance reviews, compliance, and employee development
	Provide HR support to management and frontline teams
	Develop HR policies and ensure adherence across all departments
	Oversee workforce planning and talent pipeline development for critical role
	Strengthen performance management systems to improve accountability and results
	Support conflict resolution, disciplinary processes, and employee relations
	Monitor HR metrics and provide insights that guide leadership decisions.


Person Specification


	Minimum of a First degree (BSc/HND) in Business Administration, Marketing, Management, or any related field.
	2+ years of experience managing HR functions

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business & Finance Operations Manager",
  "description": "TAAS College, Ibadan isa Co-educational institution established in the Islamic tradition at KM 15, Abeokuta Road, Amunigun Village, Bode Igbo, Ibadan. The Nursery and primary school was upgraded to the secondary school by the governing council as a result of a remarkable acceptance by the Muslim Community and within a short period of existence. The college which is enriched with stately built school premises in a serene and conducive environment with modern facilities commenced operations in 2005

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business &amp; Finance Operations Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Apata / Ibadan - Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	TAAS College is seeking a highly organized, experienced, and versatile Business &amp; Finance Operations Manager to oversee the school&rsquo;s financial management, accounting operations, marketing activities, and inventory/storekeeping functions.
	The ideal candidate must be detail-oriented, trustworthy, and capable of managing multiple operational responsibilities efficiently.


Key Responsibilities
Finance &amp; Accounting:


	Manage daily financial operations of the school
	Prepare financial reports, budgets, and cash flow statements
	Maintain accurate accounting records and ensure compliance with financial regulations
	Handle payroll, fee collections, payments, and reconciliations
	Monitor expenses and implement cost-control measures


Marketing &amp; Business Development:


	Develop and execute marketing strategies to improve student enrollment
	Manage school promotions, branding, and public relations activities
	Coordinate digital and offline marketing efforts
	Track and analyze marketing performance and outcomes


Storekeeping &amp; Inventory Management:


	Maintain accurate records of school inventory and supplies
	Monitor stock levels and initiate timely procurement
	Ensure proper storage, documentation, and issuance of materials
	Prevent loss, damage, or misuse of school assets


Administrative &amp; Operational Support:


	Support management with operational planning and reporting
	Ensure internal controls and accountability systems are followed
	Liaise with vendors, service providers, and external partners


Professional Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
	Professional certifications (ICAN, ACCA, ANAN, MBA, or related) will be an added advantage
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial management, and reporting
	Proficiency in Google workspace(Google Doc, Google Sheet) and accounting software
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and communication skills
	High level of integrity, confidentiality, and professionalism


Experience:


	5&ndash;8 years of relevant work experience in finance, accounting, marketing, or operations management
	Prior experience in an educational institution is an added advantage


Location Requirement:


	Applicant must be based in Ibadan or willing to relocate close to the school


Salary

Business & Finance Operations Manager Job at TAAS College




        
    

        
        TAAS College, Ibadan isa Co-educational institution established in the Islamic tradition at KM 15, Abeokuta Road, Amunigun Village, Bode Igbo, Ibadan. The Nursery and primary school was upgraded to the secondary school by the governing council as a result of a remarkable acceptance by the Muslim Community and within a short period of existence. The college which is enriched with stately built school premises in a serene and conducive environment with modern facilities commenced operations in 2005

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business & Finance Operations Manager
Job Location: Apata / Ibadan - Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	TAAS College is seeking a highly organized, experienced, and versatile Business & Finance Operations Manager to oversee the school’s financial management, accounting operations, marketing activities, and inventory/storekeeping functions.
	The ideal candidate must be detail-oriented, trustworthy, and capable of managing multiple operational responsibilities efficiently.


Key Responsibilities
Finance & Accounting:


	Manage daily financial operations of the school
	Prepare financial reports, budgets, and cash flow statements
	Maintain accurate accounting records and ensure compliance with financial regulations
	Handle payroll, fee collections, payments, and reconciliations
	Monitor expenses and implement cost-control measures


Marketing & Business Development:


	Develop and execute marketing strategies to improve student enrollment
	Manage school promotions, branding, and public relations activities
	Coordinate digital and offline marketing efforts
	Track and analyze marketing performance and outcomes


Storekeeping & Inventory Management:


	Maintain accurate records of school inventory and supplies
	Monitor stock levels and initiate timely procurement
	Ensure proper storage, documentation, and issuance of materials
	Prevent loss, damage, or misuse of school assets


Administrative & Operational Support:


	Support management with operational planning and reporting
	Ensure internal controls and accountability systems are followed
	Liaise with vendors, service providers, and external partners


Professional Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
	Professional certifications (ICAN, ACCA, ANAN, MBA, or related) will be an added advantage
	Strong knowledge of accounting principles, financial management, and reporting
	Proficiency in Google workspace(Google Doc, Google Sheet) and accounting software
	Excellent organizational, analytical, and communication skills
	High level of integrity, confidentiality, and professionalism


Experience:


	5–8 years of relevant work experience in finance, accounting, marketing, or operations management
	Prior experience in an educational institution is an added advantage


Location Requirement:


	Applicant must be based in Ibadan or willing to relocate close to the school


Salary
N75,000 - N100,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, application letter and all documents to: taascollege@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
